    • Method Detail

      • nextTranslatedRow

        public String nextTranslatedRow(int limit,
                                boolean force,
                                boolean wholeWordsOnly)
        Specified by:
        nextTranslatedRow in interface BrailleTranslatorResult
        Parameters:
        limit - specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the result
        force - specifies if the translator should force a break at the limit if no natural break point is found
        wholeWordsOnly - specifies that the row may not end on a break point inside a word.
        Returns:
        returns the translated string preceding the row break, including a translated hyphen at the end if needed.

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Specified by:
        hasNext in interface BrailleTranslatorResult
        Returns:
        returns true if there are characters not yet extracted with nextTranslatedRow

      • getTranslatedRemainder

        public String getTranslatedRemainder()
        Specified by:
        getTranslatedRemainder in interface BrailleTranslatorResult
        Returns:
        returns the characters not yet extracted with nextTranslatedRow

      • countRemaining

        public int countRemaining()
        Specified by:
        countRemaining in interface BrailleTranslatorResult
        Returns:
        returns the number of characters in getTranslatedRemainder
